plot: "A laughable effect obtained by reversing the action of a picture, so that dishes laden with food, bottles, etc., come flying to the table, apparently hurled through the air."
title: Quick Lunch
plot_es: "A laughable effect obtained by reversing the action of a picture, so that dishes laden with food, bottles, etc., come flying to the table, apparently hurled through the air."
plot_en: "A laughable effect obtained by reversing the action of a picture, so that dishes laden with food, bottles, etc., come flying to the table, apparently hurled through the air."
